title: Refactor Backend for Pydantic v2 and SQLAlchemy 2.0
description: Update all backend code to use Pydantic v2 (removing v1 compat hacks like model_to_dict) and SQLAlchemy 2.0 (new ORM patterns, mapped_column). Remove deprecated FastAPI patterns.
acceptance_criteria: No usage of Pydantic v1 compat functions
All SQLAlchemy models use 2.0 ORM patterns
